title: Ski Season Getaway Near Mount Buller
description: Embark on a snowy adventure at the gateway to Mt Buller, Australia’s top snow sports destination. If you want to make the most of the ski season, a stay at Merrijig Motor Inn is the perfect choice. Only 10 minutes from the entry to Mt Buller, this cosy motor inn offers comfortable accommodation in a prime location. You’ll also benefit from your included 20% discount on ski gear hire, 30% discount on breakfast at the inn’s bistro, complimentary Wi-Fi and complimentary parking.

title: Pinnacle Valley Apartment-Style Escape near Mount Buller with Onsite Dining & Spa
description:
Let the allure of Victoria's High Country enchant you with a stay at this serene countryside resort. Located in the heart of the Australian Alps, the pristine property offers a unique blend of adventure and relaxation. Delight in the nearby ski fields, cycling trails and golf courses, or explore the region's acclaimed wineries and gourmet food producers.

When you're not out adventuring, savour local flavours at the onsite Peaks Restaurant, take a dip in the heated pool or relax in your comfortable, alpine-inspired studio or apartment. With tennis, basketball and volleyball courts on site and mini golf for all birdie lovers, you won't run out of entertainment options. And don't forget to indulge in relaxing therapies at the onsite spa.
